title: African carving: a Dogon Kanaga mask
brief_description: Examines the ceremonies and rituals surrounding the Kanaga mask. Shows the ritual of carving the mask and presents part of the ceremony in which the mask is used to release the spirit of a dead man.
description: Examines the ceremonies and rituals surrounding the Kanaga mask. Shows the ritual of carving the mask and presents part of the ceremony in which the mask is used to release the spirit of a dead man.
